author: Staff Reporter
text:
The four-day-annual international techo-management festival, Kurukshetra 'The Battle Of Brains' will start at the College of Engineering, Guindy, Anna University from February 17 (Wednesday).

According to a press release, the tenth edition of the festival will be inaugurated by Abhas Mitra, former Head of Theoretical Astrophysics, Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC).

The festival features over 30 events and workshops from various fields with more than 20,000 participants from across the country expected to participate.

For more details log onto:www.kurukshetra.org.in
title: Kurukshetra fest from Feb 17
